text: Grant Fisher (born April 22, 1997) is an American middle- and long-distance runner. In 2025, he set world records in two events. He set the world indoor record in the 3000-meter race at the Millrose Games. His time was 7:22.91. He set the world indoor record in the 5000-meter race at the Boston University David Hemery Valentine Invitational. His time was 12:44.09. == References == Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Medalists at the 2024 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States
title: Grant Fisher
